verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* me an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*: of every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that giveth it \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* with his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* my \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*.\f + \fr 25.2 \ft bring me: Heb. take for me\f*\f + \fr 25.2 \ft offering: or, heave offering\f*

And this \add is\add* the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* which ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of them; \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,\f + \fr 25.3 \ft offering: or, heave offering\f*

And \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add*,\f + \fr 25.4 \ft fine…: or, silk\f*

And \w rams’|strong="H0352"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* dyed \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, and \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*,

\w Oil|strong="H8081"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* for \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and for \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,
\w Onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* to be \w set|strong="H4394"\w* in the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and in the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.
And let them \w make|strong="H6213"\w* me a \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*; that I may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

According to all that I \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thee, \add after\add* the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, even so shall ye \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ And they shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof.

And thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w within|strong="H1004"\w* and \w without|strong="H2351"\w* shalt thou \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* it, and shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* upon it a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And thou shalt \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for it, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6471"\w* thereof; and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of it, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* in the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* side of it.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H0935"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* into the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* by the \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, that the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* may be \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* with them.
The \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* in the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*: they shall not be \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* from it.
And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* which I shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add of\add* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them, in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*.

And \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* on the one \w end|strong="H7098"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* on the \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w end|strong="H7098"\w*: \add even\add* of the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* shall ye \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 25.19 \ft of…: or, of the matter of the mercy seat\f*

And the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* shall \w stretch|strong="H6566"\w* forth \add their\add* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* on \w high|strong="H4605"\w*, \w covering|strong="H5526"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* with their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \add shall look\add* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0251"\w*; toward the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* shall the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* be.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*; and in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* that I shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

And there I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* with thee, and I will \w commune|strong="H1696"\w* with thee from above the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*, from \w between|strong="H0996"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* which \add are\add* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, of all \add things\add* which I will give thee in \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt also \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof.

And thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thereto a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto it a \w border|strong="H4526"\w* of an hand \w breadth|strong="H2948"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* to the \w border|strong="H4526"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for it \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* that \add are\add* on the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* thereof.

Over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w border|strong="H4526"\w* shall the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* be for \w places|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, that the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* may be \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* with them.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w dishes|strong="H7086"\w* thereof, and \w spoons|strong="H3709"\w* thereof, and \w covers|strong="H7184"\w* thereof, and \w bowls|strong="H4518"\w* thereof, to \w cover|strong="H5258"\w* \w withal|strong="H2004"\w*: \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them.\f + \fr 25.29 \ft to…: or, to pour out withal\f*
And thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w shewbread|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me \w alway|strong="H8548"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \add of\add* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* shall the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* be \w made|strong="H6213"\w*: his \w shaft|strong="H3409"\w*, and his \w branches|strong="H7070"\w*, his \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w*, his \w knops|strong="H3730"\w*, and his \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w*, shall be of the same.

And \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* shall \w come|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* of it; \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* out of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* out of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*:

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made like unto \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w*, \add with\add* a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* and a \w flower|strong="H6525"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*; and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made like \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w* in the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, \add with\add* a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* and a \w flower|strong="H6525"\w*: so in the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* that \w come|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.

And in the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \add shall be\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made like unto \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w*, \add with\add* their \w knops|strong="H3730"\w* and their \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w*.

And \add there shall be\add* a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, and a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, and a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, according to the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* that \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.

Their \w knops|strong="H3730"\w* and their \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* shall be of the same: all it \add shall be\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof: and they shall \w light|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof, that they may give \w light|strong="H0215"\w* over \w against|strong="H5676"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 25.37 \ft shall light: or, shall cause to ascend\f*\f + \fr 25.37 \ft it: Heb. the face of it\f*
And the \w tongs|strong="H4457"\w* thereof, and the \w snuffdishes|strong="H4289"\w* thereof, \add shall be of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.
\add Of\add* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* shall he \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it, with all these \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*.

And \w look|strong="H7200"\w* that thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* after their \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w*, which was \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* thee in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 25.40 \ft which…: Heb. which thou wast caused to see\f*
